item.title: I get a last chance to get my old account back!
item.dc:creator: @dbzmaster555 dbzmaster
item.description:
@dbzmaster555 wrote:

[quote=“Hex Key, post:16, topic:31046”]You could always trying ringing Jagex ban department:

Ask for either of the 2 below at reception then plead your case.
Or ask for a lower member of ban support offer to give them monies to unban you. (low level ban staff wil be up for bribes for sure)

Head of Customer Relations - Kelvin P

Snapshot Ban Appeal Team Unit Leader - Daniel H

Tele: 01223 503 861
Tele2: 01223 535 185
Fax: 01223 515 212
11 Sturton Street, Cambridge, CB1 2SN, UK

In your case its probably not worth it, but i have banned characters with 500Mill+ of items.[/quote]

What the hell are you talking about your not even a jagex staff you fucking noob.

Read full topic

item.title: I get a last chance to get my old account back!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

i got unbanned! my level 79 miner, i put membership on it and got it to 80 mining myself (200,000xp in one day ftw) next day im banned.

go into rs official forums and read rants page, read the sticky titled recent unbanning thingy.
i was one of the unlucky people.
they are refunding my membership wewt!

item.title: I get a last chance to get my old account back!
item.dc:creator: @j4m3s j4m3s
item.description:
@j4m3s wrote:

Dear Jagex,

Hello, 1 year ago i made the bad mistake of saying a very bad word, i thought i was deemed unworthy to have my account back so i have not appealed. But now i think i am finally ready. In the last year i have matured since hitting puberty. I now know that these words are not only unacceptable in runescape, it is unacceptale in society aswell. Please give me 1 final chance with my acount

Sincerely [ ]

Read full topic

item.title: I get a last chance to get my old account back!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Yea, how the f did you get banned for offensive language? You must have putting out every string of uncensored cusses in the dictionary. But yea, just sound really remorseful and invoke pity. Sound like a 5 year old if you have to.

There a few months ago after the game engine revamp, it let you say “tfuck” completely uncensored.

I got 4 black marks that day lmao.

Also - before that, there was a small glitch with people not turning around to face thier opponent when using magic/trading with them. I got freaked out by that.

I think about stuff like now in comparison to my server and I want to hit something lol.

Read full topic

item.title: I get a last chance to get my old account back!
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Make it with feelings, and say something like,

Hi Jagex. I am sorry for my actions almost a year ago now. I have gotten to a clean start on a new account, but would very much like my old account back. I am sorry for the bad word I said and that will NEVER happen again.

Please accept my apology, I am truly and deeply sorry, you name

Read full topic
